Package entity

Class Bullet

java.lang.Object
interfaces.Moveable
entity.Bullet
public class Bullet extends Moveable
Represents a projectile fired from a weapon.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Bullet(double x, double y, double rad, Weapon origin)
    Constructs a new Bullet object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Weapon
    getOriginWeapon()
    Returns the weapon that fired this bullet.

    Gets the damage dealt by this bullet based on the weapon that fired it and the distance it has travelled.
    String

    Returns the type of this bullet.
    String
    getWeaponType()
    Returns the type of the weapon that fired this bullet.

  • Constructor Details

    • Bullet

      public Bullet(double x, double y, double rad, Weapon origin)
      Constructs a new Bullet object.
      Parameters:
      x - the x position of the origin of this projectile.
      y - the y position of the origin of this projectile.
      rad - the angle of the velocity vector of this projectile.
      origin - the weapon which fired this bullet. This parameter is used to determine the velocity and other information about the projectile.

  • Method Details

    • getOriginWeapon

      public Weapon getOriginWeapon()
      Returns the weapon that fired this bullet.
      Returns:
      the weapon that fired this bullet.

    • getWeaponType

      public String getWeaponType()
      Returns the type of the weapon that fired this bullet.
      Returns:
      the type of the weapon that fired this bullet.
      See Also:
      • Weapon

    • getScaledDamage

      public int getScaledDamage()
      Gets the damage dealt by this bullet based on the weapon that fired it and the distance it has travelled.
      Returns:
      the scaled damage dealt by this bullet.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Returns the type of this bullet. The type is defined by the following string:

      "Bullet" + getWeaponType()

      For example, "BulletRifle" for a rifle.

      Specified by:
      getType in class Moveable
      Returns:
      the type of this bullet.
